HKU and Peking University Launch Groundbreaking Dual Degree Programme in Social Sciences: A Unique Gateway to Global Leadership
11 Jun 2025
The University of Hong Kong (HKU) is proud to announce the proposed launch of a pioneering HKU-PKU Dual Degree Programme (Politics, Philosophy and Economics) (provisional title), in collaboration with Peking University’s Yuanpei College for the 2025/26 academic year. This innovative is jointly designed by the HKU Faculty of Social Sciences and Peking University’s Yuanpei College, which offers exceptional students an unparalleled opportunity to study at two world-renowned institutions, cultivating a truly global perspective and interdisciplinary expertise.
Information Session
We welcome all interested parties to join our information session scheduled as below. Representatives from the HKU Faculty of Social Sciences and Peking University’s Yuanpei College will come to share more information on the programme’s interdisciplinary curriculum, unique opportunities offered, and the application procedures, etc.
- Date: June 16, 2025 (Monday)
- Time: 17:00 – 18:00
- Venue: CPD 2.16, 2/F, Centennial Campus, HKU
- Language: English & Mandarin
- Registration:
https://hku.au1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_eP45GeEwA0GjGR0
For media enquiries, please contact Ms. Yannis Ho (Tel: 3917-1206; Email: yannish@hku.hk).
